Messages.Author: Robert Heinkelmann
Messages.Content: Hello dear students, this years "Mathematical Geodesy" will start next week on Tuesday, 16.4.2024. It will be a classical lecture series with at site lessons and power point slides. All slides will be uploaded to ISIS. All participants please come to the first date (16.4. H6131) as I will give an introduction and explain the course structure and procedures. Thanks for attention and see you next week hopefully. Robert
